TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void KeyEventHandler(object sender, KeyEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed KeyEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub KeyEventHandler(sender As Object, e As KeyEventArgs)
public delegate void KeyEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, KeyEventArgs ^ e);
type KeyEventHandler = delegate of obj * KeyEventArgs -> unit

param.name: sender
param.span: 事件处理程序所附加到的对象。

span.span: The object where the event handler is attached.

summary.span: 表示将处理 和 路由事件以及相关附加事件和预览事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the and routed events, as well as related attached and Preview events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此委托与以下附加事件一起使用：This delegate is used with the following attached events: - - - - 此委托还与基元素上的以下路由事件一起使用。This delegate is also used with the following routed events on base elements. 这些路由事件转发前面列出的附加事件，使其更易于访问 WPF 中的常规元素模型。These routed events forward the previously listed attached events to make them more accessible to the general element model in WPF. - - - - - - - - 附加事件和基本元素路由事件共享其事件数据，路由事件的冒泡和隧道版本也共享事件数据。The attached events and the base element routed events share their event data, and the bubbling and tunneling versions of the routed events also share event data. 这可能会影响事件在传输事件路由时的已处理特性。This can affect the handled characteristics of the event as it travels the event route. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [输入概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview)。For details, see [Input Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview). ## Examples 下面的示例检查与事件关联的键是否是 键。The following example checks whether the key associated with the event is the key. [!code-csharp[keydown#KeyDownSample](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/KeyDown/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#keydownsample)] [!code-vb[keydown#KeyDownSample](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/KeyDown/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#keydownsample)]
